question: India signed a USD 50 million line of credit (LoC) agreement with which country for maritime capability building?
explanation:
India has signed a USD 50 million line of credit (LoC) agreement with the Maldives to facilitate maritime capability building of the island nations.
The agreement was signed between the Government of Maldives and EXIM Bank India, during the visit of External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar to the Maldives.
